lead_paragraph: ARLINGTON, Tex. -- The rally that won the World Series for the San Francisco Giants started with singles by Cody Ross and Juan Uribe. Of course it did.
snippet: How the Giants pulled off the seventh-inning rally that won Game 5 and the championship off Cliff Lee, who peeks ahead to free agency.

headline.main: The Rally That Won the World Series, and the Aftermath for Cliff Lee

abstract: How the Giants pulled off the seventh-inning rally that won Game 5 and the championship off Cliff Lee, who peeks ahead to free agency.
